messageBody:
If the empty block bothers you (as it does me), make more assertions:

catch (SomeException e) {
assertTrue("offending field not included in error
message",e.getMessage().indexof("badfield") != -1);
}

Typically when something's gone wrong, I want to be sure there's some
particular piece of information in the output anyway.

-Kevin
